name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Dive: AI Summary & Chat for YouTube, PDF, & Web — Privacy-First

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In-depth summary & chat w/ jump-to-section, line/timestamp refs, custom lengths & more. Minimal permissions. Uses GPT-4o & Claude.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✅ Designed for YouTube videos, PDFs, & webpages
🤓 Summary — fast-loading sections, custom lengths, highlights & more
💬 Chat questions — ask any Q&A with line references
🦘 Line/timestamp references — for every summary bullet, chat reply, & more
😎 Highlighted key phrases & follow-up questions to dive deeper
🌐 Multilingual — 60+ languages supported
🧠 Uses the latest models from OpenAI GPT-4o / ChatGPT, Anthropic Claude, & Google Gemini
🔒 Privacy-first — Extension can't access your browser data except when you use it on a webpage

➤ PRIVACY FIRST — REQUIRES MINIMAL PERMISSIONS

Unlike most extensions, The Dive can't read your browser data unless it's used. Our app DOES NOT request permission to "Read and change your data on all websites" — because we don't need it! We believe great tools put privacy first.

➤ USE THE DIVE ON

- Blogs
- YouTube videos
- PDFs
- Long articles
- Academic papers
- Financial/legal documents
- and more!
